description.displayText:
Daphne provided companion care to my 90 year old mother. She was a great relief to our family and my mother really liked her. In addition to helping my mother around her home  Daphne provided transportation and help on doctor visits, prescription pickup, grocery shopping, etc. 

My mother depended on Daphne.  She was always punctual and communicated well with us in regard to my mothers mental and physical well being. 

I would highly recommend Daphne.
